001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSegmentRequest;
009
010import java.util.HashSet;
011import java.util.Set;
012
013/**
014 * If the segment index is invalid, returns ErrorResponse with INVALID_PARAMETER, which causes the
015 * pump to terminate the Bluetooth connection, so do NOT arbitrarily query for all segments.
016 *
017 * @see com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.InsulinDeliveryProfileRequestBuilder
018 */
019/**
020 * If the segment index is invalid, returns ErrorResponse with INVALID_PARAMETER, which causes the
021 * pump to terminate the Bluetooth connection, so do NOT arbitrarily query for all segments.
022 *
023 * @see com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.InsulinDeliveryProfileRequestBuilder
024 *
025
026 *
027 * <br>
028 *
029 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest}, opCode 67, size 15
030 *
031 * <br>
032 *
033 * 
034 * <table border='1'>
035 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>67</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>15</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * </table>
041 */@MessageProps(
042    opCode=67,
043    size=15,
044    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
045    request=IDPSegmentRequest.class
046)
047public class IDPSegmentResponse extends Message {
048    
049    private int idpId;
050    private int segmentIndex;
051    private int profileStartTime;
052    private int profileBasalRate;
053    private long profileCarbRatio;
054    private int profileTargetBG;
055    private int profileISF;
056    private int idpStatusId;
057    private Set<IDPSegmentStatus> idpStatus;
058    
059    public IDPSegmentResponse() {}
060    
061    public IDPSegmentResponse(int idpId, int segmentIndex, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int statusId) {
062        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, segmentIndex, profileStartTime, profileBasalRate, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF, statusId);
063        this.idpId = idpId;
064        this.segmentIndex = segmentIndex;
065        this.profileStartTime = profileStartTime;
066        this.profileBasalRate = profileBasalRate;
067        this.profileCarbRatio = profileCarbRatio;
068        this.profileTargetBG = profileTargetBG;
069        this.profileISF = profileISF;
070        this.idpStatusId = statusId;
071        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
072        
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * <table border="1">
077     * <caption>Parsed fields for IDPSegmentResponse:</caption>
078     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td><code>segmentIndex</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td><code>profileStartTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 2)</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td><code>profileBasalRate</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td><code>profileCarbRatio</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 6)</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td><code>profileTargetBG</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 10)</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td><code>profileISF</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 12)</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td><code>idpStatusId</code></td><td><code>raw[14]</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td><code>idpStatus</code></td><td><code>getIdpStatus()</code></td></tr>
087     * </table>
088     */
089    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
090        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
091        this.cargo = raw;
092        this.idpId = raw[0];
093        this.segmentIndex = raw[1];
094        this.profileStartTime = Bytes.readShort(raw, 2);
095        this.profileBasalRate = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
096        this.profileCarbRatio = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 6);
097        this.profileTargetBG = Bytes.readShort(raw, 10);
098        this.profileISF = Bytes.readShort(raw, 12);
099        this.idpStatusId = raw[14];
100        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
101        
102    }
103
104    
105    /**
106     * <table border="1">
107     * <caption>Byte layout for IDPSegmentResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
108     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
109     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) idpId</code></td></tr>
110     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) segmentIndex</code></td></tr>
111     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
112     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
113     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
114     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
115     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
116     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
117     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
118     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
119     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
120     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
121     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
122     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
123     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>(byte) idpStatusId</code></td></tr>
124     * </table>
125     */
126    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, int segmentIndex, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int idpStatusId) {
127        return Bytes.combine(
128            new byte[]{ (byte) idpId }, 
129            new byte[]{ (byte) segmentIndex }, 
130            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime), 
131            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate), 
132            Bytes.toUint32(profileCarbRatio), 
133            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG), 
134            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF), 
135            new byte[]{ (byte) idpStatusId });
136    }
137    
138    public int getIdpId() {
139        return idpId;
140    }
141    public int getSegmentIndex() {
142        return segmentIndex;
143    }
144    public int getProfileStartTime() {
145        return profileStartTime;
146    }
147    public int getProfileBasalRate() {
148        return profileBasalRate;
149    }
150    public long getProfileCarbRatio() {
151        return profileCarbRatio;
152    }
153    public int getProfileTargetBG() {
154        return profileTargetBG;
155    }
156    public int getProfileISF() {
157        return profileISF;
158    }
159    public int getIdpStatusId() {
160        return idpStatusId;
161    }
162    public Set<IDPSegmentStatus> getIdpStatus() {
163        return IDPSegmentStatus.fromBitmask(idpStatusId);
164    }
165
166
167    public enum IDPSegmentStatus {
168        BASAL_RATE(1),
169        CARB_RATIO(2),
170        TARGET_BG(4),
171        CORRECTION_FACTOR(8),
172        UNKNOWN_16(16),
173        ;
174
175        private final int id;
176        IDPSegmentStatus(int id) {
177            this.id = id;
178        }
179
180        public int getId() {
181            return id;
182        }
183
184        public static Set<IDPSegmentStatus> fromBitmask(int mask) {
185            Set<IDPSegmentStatus> items = new HashSet<>();
186            for (IDPSegmentStatus status : values()) {
187                if ((mask & status.getId()) != 0) {
188                    items.add(status);
189                }
190            }
191
192            return items;
193        }
194
195        public static int toBitmask(IDPSegmentStatus ...items) {
196            int mask = 0;
197            for (IDPSegmentStatus item : items) {
198                mask += item.getId();
199            }
200            return mask;
201        }
202    }
203    
204}
